item.title: Hi, I'm Kamal!
item.description: Short Story I’m currently working as a Backend Developer at Bukalapak, one of the largest e-commerce company in Indonesia. In 2016, me with other colleagues founded DAGOZILLA ITB, back then still a Mobile Soccer Robot Team that compete annually in a local RoboCup Middle Size League-typed competition named KRSBI-B (Kontes Robot Sepak Bola Indonesia Beroda). After graduated from Institut Teknologi Bandung (ITB), I still gave advices and helped the team become more established.

item.title: C++ MJPEG over HTTP Library
item.description: https://github.com/nadjieb/cpp-mjpeg-streamer Features No OpenCV dependencies (Clear problems separation) Set different streams depending on HTTP GET path Multi-threaded streaming Single Header-only library

item.title: DAGOZILLA ITB
item.description: About Founded in 2016, DAGOZILLA ITB is a research team from Institut Teknologi Bandung (ITB) which focuses on Mobile Robot Development. Co-founded and built a strong multidisciplinary engineering team. Developed vision system with OpenCV in C++ for Mobile Soccer Robots to detect ball, field, lines, and obstacles. Also initiated catadioptric mirror transformation feature. Guided the team until in 2020 to be qualified for RoboCup Middle Size League for the first time (https://msl.
